      • constructRayThroughPixel

        public Ray constructRayThroughPixel(double x,
                           double y,
                           double height,
                           double width)
        Transforms image coordinates to view pane coordinates. Returns the ray which goes through the middle.
        Parameters:
        x - - x value of pixel
        y - - y value of pixel
        Returns:
        Ray - that from camera through the pixel (x,y) on the canvas
